ref.Programmability.Name: StateProgram17_20
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand: CREATE FUNCTION [sbor].[StateProgram17_20] (@id int,@DocType VARCHAR(128)) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT SPLSP.NumberN AS GoalIndicator--наименование Подпрограммы ,FS.Caption AS NumberName -- наименование финансого показателя ,SPSPRMV.Value AS GIValue --Значение ,YEAR(HP.DateEnd) AS NumYear --Год FROM doc.StateProgram AS SP INNER JOIN ( SELECT LSP.id AS id ,LSP.idOwner AS idOwner ,@DocType + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LSP.Caption DESC) AS VARCHAR(32)) + '. ' + LSP.Caption AS NumberN--номер строки FROM tp.StateProgram_ListSubProgram AS LSP INNER JOIN ref.DocType AS DT ON LSP.idDocType = DT.id WHERE DT.Caption = @DocType AND LSP.idOwner = @id ) AS SPLSP ON SPLSP.idOwner = SP.id LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_SubProgramResourceMaintenance AS SPSPRM--Ресурсное обеспечение ВЦП и основных мероприятий ON SPSPRM.idMaster = SPLSP.id LEFT JOIN ref.FinanceSource AS FS --Источники финансирования ON FS.id = SPSPRM.idFinanceSource LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_SubProgramResourceMaintenance_Value AS SPSPRMV--Ресурсное обеспечение ВЦП и основных мероприятий - значения ON SPSPRMV.idMaster = SPSPRM.id LEFT JOIN ref.HierarchyPeriod AS HP ON HP.id = SPSPRMV.idHierarchyPeriod WHERE SP.id = @id )
